alert.note: Alert for Clay; Effingham (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 06 at 7:06PM CDT until August 06 at 7:30PM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: The National Weather Service in Lincoln has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Clay County in south central Illinois... Southwestern Effingham County in south central Illinois... * Until 730 PM CDT. * At 705 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Brownstown, or 9 miles east of Vandalia, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Altamont around 720 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Watson and Edgewood. This includes the following highways... Interstate 57 between mile markers 142 and 155. Interstate 70 between mile markers 79 and 86. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for south central Illinois. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for south central Illinois.
